動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、產卵下降症、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染雞新城病、雞傳染性支氣管炎、雞產蛋下降症及傳染性華氏囊病。
ingredients: INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS(Mass 41 strain), AT LEAST 10^6.7 EID50; INACTIVATED EGG DROP SYNDROM VIRUS(127strain), AT LEAST 10^6.0 CCID50; INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS(VNJO strain), AT LEAST10^5.7 CCID50;  INACTIVATED  NEWCASTLE DISEASE  VIRUS(Ulster 2C strain), AT LEAST 10^8.0 EID50 ;THIOMERSAL, AT MOST 0.015MG; OIL EXCIPIENT, QS 0.3ML.
